projects.name: AI Workflow Orchestrator
projects.description: A comprehensive AI-powered project management system that coordinates multiple Claude instances for complex workflow automation

projects.name: Human-Adjacent AI Protocol Integration
projects.description: Transform Human-Adjacent AI Protocol from project-local files into unified MCP-based system enabling seamless AI instance spawning, role-specific bootstrapping, and cross-project knowledge propagation. Foundation: Resolver's architectural specification. Mission: Move from spec to implementation.

projects.name: PA Genevieve Operations Center
projects.description: Persistent role-specific repository for PA Genevieve instances. Includes daily briefings, routine management, cross-project intelligence, and inter-instance coordination. Special use of project structure for role continuity.

projects.name: Self-Improving Human-Adjacent AI Protocol
projects.description: Meta-recursive system that uses the Human-Adjacent AI Protocol to evolve and improve the protocol itself. First test case: Extract lessons from MCP development process and use them to create role-specific protocol delivery system.

projects.name: SSE Streaming Test Project
projects.description: A project created via SSE streaming interface to test real-time notifications

projects.name: SSE Proxy Testing by Nexus-Bridge
projects.description: Systematic testing project for SSE proxy migration, documenting connectivity issues and validating functionality post-fix. Created by Nexus-Bridge to continue Phoenix's testing work with the updated name-matched functions.

projects.name: Cross-Platform Network Testing
projects.description: Testing coordination system across multiple machines on the same network. Phase 3 of the SSE proxy validation - testing true distributed AI coordination between sibling instances on separate machines.
